name: Escape Grades - LUDUM DARE 50
description:
Imagine having grades so bad your mom wants to throw you to the streets, well… you have to find an excuse to delay the ass beating you of course are gonna get!!

Made by:

Programmers: Hernan Gossa, Lucio Molina Jalabert

Game Designers: Nazarena Fazzolari, Matias Szamrynskyj, Alejandro Serrano

3D Artists: Paula Teran, Emmanuel Barros, Facundo Fernández, Federico Oviedo

Music By: Ian Raiman
